授業方法:
On-demand A (with timetable).
There will be a Preliminary Exam on the first day of class. There will be a Summary Exam on the final day of class. On the other class days, there will be lectures (or on-line readings/slideshows/videos in the event of pandemic mitigation). Links to course materials will be available on-line via LUNA or the course website. Announcements will be made via LUNA, the course website, or e-mail (to kwansei addresses). Readings will be suggested. Homework will be given to stimulate thinking about certain concepts of the course.

第1回: Preliminary EXAM: basic concepts covered in 多言語多文化論 Multilingualism and Multiculturalism
第3回: the concept of "language ecology" and the metaphor of ecology
第10回: the concept of ecolinguistics and the environmental effects of language
トピック.授業外学習2: Students should look at class notes and on-line references to further learning and to prepare for exams.
